voxelmod package¶

Submodules¶

voxelmod.reduce_voxel module¶

Reduces the number of materials in a Virtual Population voxel model.

class voxelmod.reduce_voxel.ReduceVoxel(voxelMapFile, voxelObject)¶

Bases: object

Voxel map for reduced set of biological materials.

voxelModel¶

Return the reduced voxel model object.

voxelmod.reduce_voxel.random() → x in the interval [0, 1).¶

voxelmod.virtual_population module¶

A python class to represent Virtual Population voxel model info and data.

class voxelmod.virtual_population.VirtualPopulation¶

Bases: object

Holds Virtual Population

appendMaterial(materialName, RGB_Red, RGB_Green, RGB_Blue)¶

Add a material to the end of the list with optional RGB color.

data¶

Return the Raw Voxel Data

dx¶

Returns delta-x of voxel object.

dy¶

Returns delta-y of voxel object.

dz¶

Returns delta-z of voxel object.

material(matNum)¶

Returns the material at specified location.

name¶

Returns name of Voxel Model.

numMaterials¶

Returns the number of materials in voxel object.

nx¶

Returns x-dimension of voxel object.

ny¶

Returns y-dimension of voxel object.

nz¶

Returns z-dimension of voxel object.

removeMaterial(materialName)¶

Remove material with given name.

voxelmod.virtual_population.readVirtualPopulation(infoFile, dataFile)¶

Read Virtual Population info and data files and return a Virtual Population voxel object.

voxelmod.virtual_population.writeVirtualPopulation(vpVoxel, filePath='/Data/CMRR/voxelmod/docs')¶

Write Virtual Population info and data files from given Virtual Population voxel object.
